CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL ( If_Article_is_Linked__c , "Created"), "Create", IF(ISPICKVAL ( Is_the_Article_Valid__c , "Yes"), "Re-Use", IF(ISPICKVAL ( Is_the_Article_Valid__c , "No"), "Inaccurate Re-Use", IF(ISPICKVAL ( Does_an_Article_Exist__c , "Yes"), "Loss Re-Use", IF(ISPICKVAL ( Does_an_Article_Exist__c , "No"), "Loss Create", IF(ISPICKVAL ( Was_Knowledge_Required__c , "No"), "No Link Required", NULL))))))
CustomField.label: Disposition
